LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom related list component for Account records displaying Cases, Credit Score History, and Billing Records with agent security restrictions.

property.name: showCases
property.label: Show Cases
property.description: Display cases assigned to the current agent for this account

property.name: showCreditScores
property.label: Show Credit Score History
property.description: Display credit score history for this account

property.name: showBillingRecords
property.label: Show Billing Records
property.description: Display billing records for this account

property.name: maxRecords
property.label: Max Records
property.description: Maximum number of records to display in each related list (1-20)

property.name: recordId
property.label: Account Record ID
property.description: The Account record ID to display related lists for
